CustomField.description: This field is auto populated when requester user is filled out. When the requester user is set on the DRF, a team member is created and linked to the show.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is auto populated when requester user is filled out. When the requester user is set on the DRF, a team member is created and linked to the show.
CustomField.label: Requester Team Member
